Description:
Timeless Quality
Set on an elevated allotment in one of the most peaceful streets in the heart of Kennington, this two-bedroom plus study townhouse is spacious enough to be a family home. Whilst boasting all the benefits of downsizingâ?? easy care gardens, secure backyard, and minimal upkeep, it doesn't compromise on entertaining. Featuring Lounge room, large high functional kitchen, separate dining and a separate study. The highlight of this property is the large sunroom which leads on the back entertaining area. Perfect for seamless inside, outside living.
With one of the best floorplans you are likely to see, this is a timeless build, with classic features which never go out of style.â?¨There are high ceilings, bay windows, a modern bathroom for each bedroom, evaporative cooling throughout the home and great insulation to keep you comfortable year round.â?¨ With reverse cycle air-conditioning and numerous TV points. â?¨This house offers great living flexibility and with all the services close by in walking distance at Strath Village and Strath Hill, this is an address to inspect with confidence.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results! (03) 5442 1422.

Description:
A Home with a Touch of Everything
Move in and enjoy the superb presentation this beautiful cream brick home has to offer.
With options in the floorplan, you could set it up like a 4 bedroom home with separate kitchen/meals and lounge area or alternatively into a 3 bedroom and 2 living area home.
In the heart of Kennington, but also bordering all the popular Strathdale facilities including shopping centres, schools, recreational facilities and La Trobe Uni, a short walk away.
Updated kitchen, bathroom, ducted heating and cooling provided, built-in robes in all the bedrooms and plenty more updates, fixtures and fittings throughout.
Outside finds a colourbond shed with concrete and power, a 10m x 3m tandem carport, and undercover paved entertainment areas.
Securely fenced with well-presented gardens, this home is one to inspect to really appreciate the features and benefits it has to offer.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
Quietly quaint and a stroll into town.
Situated at the Townsend Street end of Neale Street, on a wide roadway with easy access to town. This quaint two bedroom plus study home promises you an easy living lifestyle. Wonderful original features throughout, polished timber floors & classical frieze work on entry hallway. Two large bedrooms. Master with a walk through robe an additional study or even small nursery. Red brick paving an extra outdoor toilet & cottage garden set up make it an ideal first home or prime investment opportunity. A newly updated white bathroom filters morning light throughout. Single auto garage provides an extra space for undercover entertaining in this little pocket of Kennington. The charm will capture you.

Description:
PROFIT FROM THE POTENTIAL
Perched high on the block In relatively original condition is this elevated three bedroom weatherboard home. A perfect blank canvas for future gain and growth. Step up onto the front veranda with it's iron balustrade. Once inside the home enter from the central hallway into the open plan living/dining/kitchen. Spacious living area provides gas space heater, air conditioning unit and ceiling fan. Kitchen comprises gas upright stove. Combined bathroom/laundry (vanity and shower). Narrow rear tiled porch area. Two separate single garages with concrete floors.
Extras include awnings and 10' approx ceilings.
Close proximity to terrific schools, LaTrobe University, large Strathdale shopping complexes, transport and only minutes into Bendigo's CBD.
Currently tenanted until November 2016 @ $230pw.
Inspections by Appointment only.
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
The Address Says It All!
At this exclusive address, you have the best of both worlds. Walking distance to the ever popular Strathdale shopping centre, schools and the Kennington Reservoir, is this beautifully presented 3 bedroom home. Features include 2 living areas, modern kitchen with quality appliances. The main bedroom has an ensuite & WIR (the other bedrooms have BIRs). Heating & cooling throughout and all fixtures & fittings are of high quality. Sliding doors open out to the decked entertaining area & the immaculate, manicured lawn & gardens. There's a single garage with internal access plus a roller door provides drive through access to the back yard with a garden shed. An inspection will impress as properties of this quality and location rarely become available to purchase.

MASSIVE PRICE REDUCTION!!
Looking for a trouble free investment, or wish to downsize, then this spacious 2 bedroom brick veneer unit represents a great opportunity. Situated in sought after Kennington only minutes from Strath Village, Latrobe University, sporting grounds and popular Kennington Reservoir the property includes built in robes, open plan lounge/dining area, reverse cycle split air-conditioning, modern kitchen, 3 piece bathroom and lock-up garage. Ideal as an investment property with an excellent track record, or for the owner occupier enjoy low maintenance living surrounded by all the amenities you could hope for. Until recently, leased at $240 per week.

Description:
When location & Quality Matters
Set in one of Bendigo's most sought after locations sits this beautiful property complete with high ceilings, updated kitchen, quality carpets & quality window furnishings.
The home boasts an updated kitchen complete with soft close draws, dishwasher and plenty of storage solutions. The open plan lounge and dining area are a substantial size and provide access to the alfresco area. The main bedroom is impressive with his & hers built in robes + ensuite, while the second bedroom is sizeable with built in robes.
Impressively landscaped gardens are a feature externally with secure fencing and space aplenty on the 600+sqm allotment. A large rainwater tank and oversized garden shed complete this great package!

Description:
THE BEST IN LUXURIOUS LIVING
From generously proportioned living areas to superb outdoor entertainment options, this updated Federation-styled home has it all! Ideally set on approx. 1,600m2 in a sought-after Kennington location the home offers beautifully landscaped gardens front and back and comprises 3 bedrooms, the main with a walk in robe and stylish ensuite and built in robes to the remaining bedrooms plus a separate study, a well-appointed kitchen with quality appliances and a large walk in pantry and a formal dining and living area. The home also includes a spacious informal living area, a 3 piece family bathroom, laundry with great storage options plus the convenience of ducted heating and cooling ensuring year round comfort. The outside beckons with private undercover entertaining area overlooking the solar-heated, salt-chlorinated in-ground pool, fully landscaped surrounds and a handy garden shed. Offering excellent access to walking tracks, schools, the newly opened Kennington Village and the Bendigo CBD, an inspection really is a must to appreciate all the wonderful qualities that this property has to offer.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
Forever Young
In this handsome, cleverly designed one-bedroom unit you'll enjoy escaping from the rigours of the outside world. It's a haven offering peace and security, yet set in a great location close to the action when you feel the need to spread your wings.
Situated in the supportive community of Freedom Village, you're close to shops, parks and medical facilities.
Thanks to large windows in the front room there's plenty of light. A ceiling fan in the living area is also a handy feature.
Discover large built-in wardrobes in the bedroom, a ceiling fan and easy access to the back area.
In the well-designed kitchen and living area there's room for all you'll need with just the right amount of storage and bench space.
Great design continues in the bathroom where there are mobility aids where they're needed, there's a flexible shower hose extension, a bath plus a large basin.
When the mood takes you there's the opportunity to enjoy the lovely facilities at Freedom Village including the lush gardens, undercover alfresco areas, barbecue, an on-site caf and bar, hair salon, movie theatre, activities centre and communal dining area.
Wander through this lovely property and you'll realise it's an elegant, timeless, well-rounded address with enduring appeal.
Insights: Unit 20,107 Condon Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
True Gem in a Great Location
Petite white-rendered brick home has street appeal in spades with bold black and white striped awnings, colonial-style windows and gabled front portico.
But it's not just a pretty face, there's much to love inside as well with a practical layout including three bedrooms, L-shaped lounge/dining room, compact kitchen with electric cooking and plenty of storage. It's all snug and warm through winter with ducted gas heating complemented by a gas space heater in the lounge with a wall-mounted air conditioner for summer.
Walk-through laundry leads to a pretty pergola-covered deck surrounded by a garden of established trees and flowering shrubs. There's a garden shed, fernery/potting shed, veggie plot, rainwater tank and tandem carport with auto door at the front for added security.
There's much to love about this appealing home, but it's now time for new owners to add their touch to the clean and classic seventies style property.
Located in one of Kennington's best streets, it would make a great first home for young couples, an ideal smaller nest for empty-nesters or a top investment property.

It may need a bit of attention, but don't hesitate - It won't be around for long!

Move straight in as is it very liveable just as it is, or renovate this beauty, as it has potential written all over it, with the home offering 3 very large bedrooms, wide hallways, good sized lounge, kitchen/meals and bathroom.

Situated in a well-held and popular area, within walking distance to the CBD, schools and some of the best recreational facilities around town. Inspect soon to see the potential for yourself.

Description:
Entertainers Paradise
INSIDE and out there's plenty of room to relax, play and entertain at this address.
You'll be impressed by the quality of the build as well and the number of storage options. Ducted heating and cooling are in place.
Situated on an elevated 1100-square-metre block, this Federation-style home with a handful of ironbark trees standing tall in the front garden, also takes advantage of treetop views beyond.
Just inside the front door is the first of two living areas: a lounge room big enough to take a billiard table. Opposite is the main bedroom which has a cleverly concealed walk-in wardrobe and a lovely three-piece en suite.
The three remaining bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and are bright and spacious. Another room with concertina doors, presently a library, could be a study or fifth bedroom.
A lovely arched hallway, wide and long, stretches from the front door to the rear of the home where a huge living area comprising kitchen, meals and living is found.
The traditional facade conceals some modern touches, especially in the dado-walled kitchen which overlooks the meals and living areas.
Timber pantry doors open to reveal slide out drawers. There are dual Westinghouse ovens; 12-month-old granite overlay benchtops, Bosch dishwasher and five-burner gas cooktop.
Doors opening from here to alfresco entertaining and up steps to an in-ground pool which is solar heated, enhance the living space.
A three-piece bathroom and a laundry complete the layout.
An impressive double garage/workshop with lock-up roller doors has a concrete floor, power and lights and good rafter storage. There's plenty of space for parking along the driveway.
The house has solar hot water backed-up by instantaneous gas, and solar panels returning power to the grid mean potentially no bills.
Close to The Kennington Centre, Strath Hill and Strath Village shops, schools and the uni, you can't go wrong.
Insights: 18 Ironbark Court, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming Home - Covenient Location
In the heart of Kennington & walking distance to town, this Edwardian beauty presents unbeatable value & style.. Solid & well-built, the weatherboard & roughcast home has been immaculately remodelled, so there is little to no work required for a new owner. There are 3 bedrooms with built-in robes, plus a study, a new timber kitchen with plenty of bench & cupboard space, a 3 piece bathroom with his & hers basins, central heating & leadlight windows. With plenty of natural light bouncing off the polished floorboards, this home is character filled with some original features maintained & all the mod cons you need for today's lifestyle. Outside there is an established garden with privacy hedges, great fencing & plenty of room for the kids & pets to play. The front yard has a picket fence, a Liquid Amber on the turn & its one of the tidiest houses in the tidiest street around. Call the agent today for an inspection of this beautiful property.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results 5442 1422

Description:
Quaint Home In Desirable Location
Just 5 minutes from the centre of Bendigo, and walking distance to a chemist, primary school and sporting facilities, is this quaint weatherboard home. Featuring 3 bedrooms, a sunroom & separate dining area. The very large lounge has a gas heater & a split system. Polished floorboards throughout; the kitchen has a gas stove, ample bench space. The main bedroom has a double BIR & polished floors. The sunroom is light and bright. Outside is single lock up shed, spacious yard with the shady trees front & back, plus the added bonus of side access. Opportunities aplenty! All this in a very desirable location.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get results 5442 1422

Description:
POSITION HAS ITS PRIVILEGES
'Aidan's Gate' - Elevated split level 3 bedroom brick veneer home brimming with natural light and great views. Spacious formal L Shaped lounge/dining room with feature timber built in bookcase, timber panelled wall, new gas wall furnace and air conditioning unit. Large master bedroom offers walk in robe with shelving. Timber kitchen cabinetry, electric hot plates, wall oven, pantry, breakfast bar and cork flooring. Family bathroom with shower, bath and skylight.
Wonderful storage throughout the home. Tandem, double carport lies behind the privacy of the secure iron gates. Lovely private rear garden with good fencing and garden shed. Positioned opposite St Aidan's Orphanage (Apartments) and Kennington Primary School. Very close to Strath Village shopping complexes, Latrobe University, swimming pool, transport and only moments into Bendigo's CBD. Ripe for an update!
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
A hot to trot investment spot!
If a prime position is on the top of your list then look no further. Opportunities like this are few and far between situated opposite Strath Village shopping centre and Kennington Village, a bus stop out the front, a walk to Latrobe University and the Kennington Reservoir, close to Schools, Parks the list is endless. This would make a great home to enter the market in, an ideal investment opportunity or as medical rooms or the like (STCA). It comprises three bedrooms, all generous size and with built in robes. Lounge room, kitchen and dining. Bathroom with shower over bath, vanity plus separate toilet and extra shower. It has reverse cycle heating and cooling for some extra comfort. A single garage/workshop with a nice size yard and secure fencing. In great original condition this home is in the ultimate position and won't last long on the market.

Description:
MODERN DAY LIVING OFFERING LIFESTYLE & LOCATION
Offering the choice of 3, brand new master built townhouses with prices starting from $300,000, these properties present a wonderful opportunity for the downsizer, investor, first home owner or young professional alike. All of these beautiful townhouses are low maintenance with minimal upkeep and completed landscaping included. The high quality, immaculately presented homes offer warm subtle décor throughout including a modern functional kitchen show-casing quality appliances, spacious open plan living, 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and a modern 3 piece bathroom completing the practical floor plan. Located in a quiet court setting within walking distance to St Theresa's Church whilst offering easy access to the Bendigo CBD including shopping, vibrant cafe's and the train station these properties present a wonderful lifestyle opportunity!
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
